name: granola
title: Granola
description: Create, manage, and review notes in Granola
author: Rob

commands.name: create-note
commands.title: Create Note
commands.subtitle: Create a new note in Granola
commands.description: Create a new note in Granola

tools.name: ai-notes
tools.title: AI Notes
tools.description: Ask AI about your notes, meetings, and transcripts from Granola

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
